extension.summary: A simple all-around Maintenance Tool for PSMC and Kodi
extension.description: PSMC's Maintenance helps to aid with a much smoother PSMC or Kodi experience without all the fluff. Features include: Auto delete of cache at start up, notify when packages and thumbs reach a set amount of wasted storage space, cuts down on your devices read/writes on the ROM.
